A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This Star Wars film would have been much better if it was an hour or so shorter. Many unnecessary and uninspired characters. Almost no plot or character development outside of Kyle Ren and Rey a little bit. The only redeeming quality is the action and the visuals but that’s the same positives as the prequels. JJ needs to come in and save this trilogy before it’s too late.
